name: Slide Box
description:
In SlideBox, you have to get to the treasure,
collecting any coins you find along the way!

Your character has the ability to move G blocks around the screen,
using arrow keys, as long as these blocks are on a grid line horizontal or parallel to your character.

----- Controls -----

< Menu >

* Mouse Cursor or Arrow Keys or WASD - Select
* Mouse Click or [Space] or [Enter] or [Z] - Confirm
* [Escape] or [Backspace] or [X] - Back

< Game >

* WASD - Move Player, Jump Player
* Arrow Keys - Slide Box
* [P] or [Space] - Pause
* [R] - Retry
